column8:
Margaret Thatcher is one of very few politicians worth admiring. In a world of political and fiscal incompetence, we mourn the passing of her kind. Someone more concerned with making hard choices rather than politically expedient ones.

This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "Of course it's the same old story. Truth usually is the same old story."
column21: This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "Of course it's the same old story. Truth usually is the same old story." A t shirt from a series to be found at weadmire.net
